Text: piratetorrent1989 - you ROCK!!!  This is a superb release - it's sort of like "Shadowlands" meets "Ingenue" - as you know, it's THAT good.  Maybe it has to do with her new producer and co-writer, Joe Pisapia, but k.d. has always written excellent songs and is one of few who can "sing no wrong" in my book.  I did not have the four bonus tracks (and in FLAC, to boot!) Will seed and THANK YOU very much!
